description: I'm a Web developer living in Bien Hoa - HCM - Viet Nam. I have a passion for code and things related to technology...

descriptions: I started learning programing when i was 16 years old, but really, I only started getting serious coding when i graduated from high school.
I spent a lot of time in vain learning a little bit of each, but not in depth. I almost fixed that.
Currently I'm diving into the NodeJS . My upcoming career goal is to become a Senior Engineer .
I always try to improve myself everyday, today is better than yesterday. Failure for me is always a lesson to grow.
Besides, I also play guitar, go running, practice calisthenics, boxing, touring, read and learn anything new related to tech
Develop a fintech product and a recruitment platform: Create and maintain scalable and efficient server-side applications using NodeJS/NestJS and PostgreSQL.
Implement searching function: integrate full-text search and boolean search for the recruitment system.
Implement security: implement passport for authentication and authorization to protect sensitive data and prevent unauthorized access.
Build a real-time messaging system for recruiters and candidates.
Conducted code cross-review.
Write unit-test, integration test.
Collaborate with the frontend team to deploy the API.
Deploying FNB system of milk tea model.
Integration with Zalo ZNS for sending order information to customers.
Implement notification scheduling.
Maintain the construction business management product.
Outsourcing project
Teamwork
Timeline Planning
